author: O.Conrad (c) 2012
library_description: Interface to LIBSVM - A Library for Support Vector Machines. Reference: Chang, C.-C. / Lin, C.-J. (2011): A library for support vector machines. ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology, vol.2/3, p.1-27. LIBSVM Homepage.

tools.author: O.Conrad (c) 2012

optionals.constraints:
Available Choices:
[0] none
[1] normalize (0-1)
[2] standardize
Default: 2
optionals.name: Scaling

optionals.constraints:
Available Choices:
[0] create from training areas
[1] restore from file
Default: 0
optionals.name: Model Source

optionals.constraints:
Available Choices:
[0] C-SVC
[1] nu-SVC
[2] one-class SVM
[3] epsilon-SVR
[4] nu-SVR
Default: 0
optionals.name: SVM Type

optionals.constraints:
Available Choices:
[0] linear
[1] polynomial
[2] radial basis function
[3] sigmoid
Default: 2
optionals.description:
linear: u'*v
polynomial: (gamma*u'*v + coef0)^degree
radial basis function: exp(-gamma*|u-v|^2)
sigmoid: tanh(gamma*u'*v + coef0)
optionals.name: Kernel Type

optionals.description: parameter C (cost) of C-SVC, epsilon-SVR, and nu-SVR
optionals.name: C

optionals.description: parameter nu of nu-SVC, one-class SVM, and nu-SVR
optionals.name: nu-SVR

optionals.description: epsilon in loss function of epsilon-SVR
optionals.name: SVR Epsilon

optionals.description: whether to use the shrinking heuristics
optionals.name: Shrinking

optionals.description: whether to train a SVC or SVR model for probability estimates
optionals.name: Probability Estimates

tools.tool_description: Support Vector Machine (SVM) based classification for grids. Reference: Chang, C.-C. / Lin, C.-J. (2011): A library for support vector machines. ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology, vol.2/3, p.1-27. LIBSVM Homepage.
